channel.title: CVE Feed for Reservation Diary -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Reservation Diary -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29806|2024-03-27T12:13:48.653Z -- Reservation Diary -- ReDi Restaurant Reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Reservation Diary ReDi Restaurant Reservation allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects ReDi Restaurant Reservation: from n/a through 24.0128.

item.title: CVE-2024-31385|2024-04-15T10:12:38.335Z -- Reservation Diary -- ReDi Restaurant Reservation
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Reservation Diary ReDi Restaurant Reservation.This issue affects ReDi Restaurant Reservation: from n/a through 24.0128.

item.title: CVE-2024-31299|2024-04-10T16:27:48.253Z -- Reservation Diary -- ReDi Restaurant Reservation
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Reservation Diary ReDi Restaurant Reservation allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects ReDi Restaurant Reservation: from n/a through 24.0128.
